messages.message:
On the Eng Resources page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/13729813/Engineering+Resources), I’ve linked to a Confluence page for the Python 3 migration (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/19923018/Python+2+to+Python+3+migration)

The next milestone in 2 weeks will be to test-run Instabase entirely using Python 3 (exciting!) — Note this will not be released to customers, but will be an internal run of Instabase.

@lydia @Chetan @Aaron Vontell could you help make sure 1) i’ve listed all Python services here and 2) they are all ready to run in Python 3? https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bKdDZPELc8noNMk1O578ZPrPIKzDj1OPPTqDHTybtDQ/edit#gid=0

A couple of us can take care of all the services listed (@Jonathan Shih will work on Emerson this release) — however, need your help on any other services (like docops-service?) to make sure it’s Python 3 ready
Updated the docops-service section -- it passes mypy for py3 + unit tests pass with PY3. There's no regression tests for docops-service (at the moment).
any reason image-tasks is crossed out? we planning on trying to sunset it before EOY? @dlluncor
sidenote: I'm so excited for mypy typing without comments in py3 :slightly_smiling_face:
Are all the services listed? Image-tasks is crossed out since we thought we'd move off of it by EOY? Is that accurate or will image-tasks live on?
